formattedAddress: 47 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Island-themed counter-serve chain offering Jamaican beef patties, jerk chicken & curry dishes.

originalText.text:
FYI : who ever give this place more than 1star needs to go to another Golden Krust that‚Äôs really care about the Jamaican Culture and eat and be the judge of my review.
This place make the most disgusting food, Golden Krust is one of my favorite restaurants I usually go and eat Oxtails even though the price is really high but that place on 14th street the owner need to hire a private shopper to see how those employees prepare those food  that‚Äôs a disgrace for the franchise and for the Jamaican culture as a bunch of Jamaicans that represent their own culture to make food so disgusting, I apologize for my frustration but that was one of the worst experience I had, specially my wife kept asking for the oxtails and after work I walk from 22nd to 14th st to surprise her and when I reach Jersey with that disgusting food my wife thought I didn‚Äôt get the food from Golden Krust, please investigate on those people, cause all they do is taking people money and give us disgusting ü§Æ food for our money.
And the lady that serving me the food was on her cellphone  the whole time and didn‚Äôt even paying no attention to me she talking over the food ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èthe whole time who are those people.

originalText.text: I went in buy some patties. The server had a nasty attitude when asked what patties they had left, she replied mild and spicy beef. I asked if they had chicken she stated only mild and spicy beef. I then proceeded to order a curry goat meal and said a small. Not realizing I wanted a mini she said goat doesn't not come in a mini with an attitude and argued back with me. She decided not to complete my order and took the next customer. I and my coworker then left the store after he placed and order before me. This server need customer etiquette and training. Her attitude was horrible.

originalText.text: Staff is very friendly and nice. The food is always hot and delicious. Best golden crust in Manhattan I have been to since the original Harlem location on 125 close down.

text.text: Staff is very friendly and nice. The food is always hot and delicious. Best golden crust in Manhattan I have been to since the original Harlem location on 125 close down.

originalText.text: The food is okay, but I was shocked to learn this place has a C score on sanitary violations, and decided to put a fake sign instead. Some of it is due to evidence for mice establishment and not keeping food in the right temperature. I do hope they will improve all of it as the food is good.

originalText.text: I enjoy going to this Restaurant, the price is perfect for the area and the city as a whole. Plus the portions are great size, coupled with good selection too. Another great aspect is the staff are always nice when I‚Äôm there too. I just wish they had a few of these places in my area of the Bronx, I‚Äôd visit daily then.
